enable_notification_title: To track the status of your requests, enable notifications
author: Added
phone_linked_to_user: This number is already linked to a user
you_copy_in_dates_with_trips: You are copying to dates that already have trips:
copy_trips_manual:
To copy trips for a day, long-click on the date whose trips you want to copy.

In the dialog that opens, specify the day to which you are copying.

To copy to several days at once, specify the number of times to copy.

The dates on which the copying will be performed will be marked with a pink copy icon
next_month_copy_warning: To avoid errors, copy to the next month manually.
empty_routes: Select routes to display trips (icon in the upper right corner).
your_route_hint:
You can select 4 routes.
Trips will be displayed by them
your_day_trips_empty: You have no trips on this day
successful_booked:
Successfully booked.

You can see your trip on the My Calendar tab.

If you change your mind about going, open the trip and click Cancel.
request_sent_to_driver:
Your request has been sent to the driver.

You can see your trip on the My Calendar tab.

If you change your mind about going, open the trip and click Cancel.
connect_with_driver: Contact the driver to clarify the details.
duplicate_booking: You already have a booking for this route:
request_exist:
You already have a request.

Wait for confirmation.
late_cancel_booking_question:
Cancel booking?️

Cancel 20 minutes or less is considered late. For more information, see the terms of use on the Profile tab.
you_have_unreviewed_trips:
Rate the level of service!

Find your trips from the last 30 days in the calendar.
mode_hint: You can change it later in the settings
frontSeatNotAvailable:
The front seat is already taken.

Disable the front seat and try again
empty_account_name_phone: Fill in the name and phone
isBlacarBookingByCityUser:
The passenger has been notified that his booking is duplicated in CityCity, so in BlaBlaCar it is possible to delete the booking and return the commission.
❗Agree this with the passenger to avoid misunderstandings.

auth.auth/code-expired: Verification code is no longer valid
auth.auth/session-expired: Verification code is no longer valid
auth.auth/too-many-requests: Too many requests. Try again in 15 minutes
auth.auth/requires-recent-login: This operation is confidential and requires recent authentication. Please sign in again before trying this request again.
auth.password_length: Password length must be at least 6 characters
auth.title: Authorization
auth.create_password_hint: Hello! Create a password for your account
auth.enter_password_hint: We are glad to see you again! Enter your account password
auth.reset_password_send_to_email: Password reset instructions sent to email

profile.label: Profile
profile.name: Name
profile.phone_is_used: Phone is already in use by another account
profile.delete_account_question: Deleting account without the possibility of recovery. Continue?
profile.delete_account_confirm: Enter email to confirm account deletion
profile.delete_account_warning: After clicking Yes - the account will be deleted without the possibility of recovery
